name: Traffic Rider: Highway Race
description:
Ride your high-performance motorcycle in the endless highways, dodging cars and overtaking everybody in the road traffic in the new racing game Traffic Rider: Highway Race. Buy new motorcycles with money that earned in the hard races. 4 crazy game modes on 3 amazing locations from endless desert highway to streets of Miami.

HOT POLICE CHASES

Be ready for escape from the cops that can catch you on your fast ride. Keep calm and ride away so fast as you can. You have to hide behind the cars in the traffic to get away from the Police pursuit. Wheelie your motorcycle(riding on the rear wheel) and you will faster than cops. Nobody said that it will be easy to win!

FEATURES

- Detailed highway's environments and great 3D graphics

- Choose your favorite bike's type: chopper, dirty cross bike or sportbike

- 4 amazing game modes and 3 unique locations

- Smart cop's AI in the Police Pursuit game mode

- First person rider view

- Real engine sounds that was recorded from real bikes

- Ride your motorbike on an endless desert highway, interstate roads or on the streets of Miami

- Fun game music

- Online leaderboards

HINTS

- You can choose one of the high-performance motorbikes that you favor in the garage menu

- If you wheelie your motorcycle(riding on the rear wheel) speed of your bike will increased on 10%. Keep this in mind while riding in the Time Trial mode.

- You'll receive more scores and money if you'll ride in the speed more than 100 km/h

- When racing over 100 km/h each close overtake gives you additional bonus scores or time (in the Time Trial game mode)

- Riding in opposite direction way in the Two Ways mode gives you extra scores
